FuncDef:
The dpfr enable command enables DPFR on an interface for fault detection.
The undo dpfr enable command disables DPFR on an interface for fault detection. The dpfr enable command enables DPFR on an interface for fault detection. The undo dpfr enable command disables DPFR on an interface for fault detection. By default, DPFR is not enabled on an interface for fault detection. This command is supported only on the CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
ParentView: 100GE interface view,10GE interface view,200GE interface view,25GE interface view,50GE interface view,Interface group view
